def_en: A telephone's receiver is the part that you hold near to your ear and speak into.

def_cn: （收音机或电视机的）信号接收器，信号接收装置
def_en: A receiver is the part of a radio or television that picks up signals and converts them into sound or pictures.

def_cn: （法庭指定的）破产接管人
def_en: The receiver is someone who is appointed by a court of law to manage the affairs of a business, usually when it is facing financial failure.
